description: country surgeon performing and operation on the forehead to remove "stones" supposedly in it; another man standing behind woman supporting her; on table lower right are surgical instruments and stones
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

in image in black: H. Weydmans / inuen et fe | below image in black: one verse in Dutch \" loopt loopt met groot verblyden, Hier sal men t wyf van Lye snyden\"  | on sheet in pencil: H. Weydmans 2-599
title: Print
